title: Microsoft Edge 101 adds default profile setting and a PWA launcher
content:
Microsoft’s Edge browser has received an update to version 101, and with it come a couple of new features, as you’d expect. There are some noteworthy updates, though, starting with the ability to set a default Edge profile when you open the browser. Edge has been getting a few improvements to the way it handles

The post Microsoft Edge 101 adds default profile setting and a PWA launcher appeared first on XDA.
description: Microsoft has updated its Edge browser to version 101, and it adds a new default profile setting along with a new way to launch web apps.
